scripts.banner:expanded:
echo '/*!
 * Milligram v1.1.0
 * http://milligram.github.io
 *
 * Copyright (c) 2016 CJ Patoilo
 * Licensed under the MIT license
*/
' | cat - dist/milligram.css > temp && mv temp dist/milligram.css
scripts.banner:compressed:
echo '/*!
 * Milligram v1.1.0
 * http://milligram.github.io
 *
 * Copyright (c) 2016 CJ Patoilo
 * Licensed under the MIT license
*/
' | cat - dist/milligram.min.css > temp && mv temp dist/milligram.min.css
scripts.autoprefixer: postcss -u autoprefixer --no-map.inline --autoprefixer.banner '/* single line comment */' --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 1 versions' -r dist/*
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean sass:expanded sass:compressed autoprefixer banner:expanded banner:compressed
